attributes.action: get rid of charities hassling people in the street and beggars
attributes.additional_details:
please can we get rid of the charities hassling people in the city centre of edinburgh if people want to give they will of their own accord not to be jostled.  charities have to realise people are struggling.

also can something be done about the beggars in Princes Street can the police move them on.  They are lowering the tone and i object to having a cup shoved in my face .
